methods.name: GetEquipmentInInventory
methods.comment: Returns the equipment in this slot

methods.name: GetEquipmentSlotEnum
methods.comment: Returns the EEquipmentSlost for this inventory

methods.name: SetOverrideEquipment
methods.comment:
This is to be called on both server and client (simulated).
@param equipment		Equipment to override with, nullptr to unequip any overridden equipment.

methods.name: GetActiveIndex
methods.comment: Returns the EEquipmentSlost for this inventory

methods.name: ContainsItemTypeAndHasEnoughSpaceForItem
methods.comment: Checks whether this contains any items of item type and whether they have room for inventory item

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Decide on what properties to replicate

methods.name: GetOwningCharacter
methods.comment: Finds and returns the cached character

properties.name: mOverrideEquipmentInSlot
properties.comment:
No need to save this, the kinds of equipments that are placed here are not good candidates for saving (e.g. build gun)
No need to replicate, this is simulated locally on the client.

properties.name: mEquipmentInSlot
properties.comment: This is the actual equipment in the slot

properties.name: mEquipmentInventorySlot
properties.comment: This inventory will only accept equipments that are supposed to be on this slot
